file_content.text: Sorry about all the nonsense before--had to keep that flunky off guard. Nice bit of rescuing, by the way.
That "flunky" almost killed you.
That was too close.
Please. I had everything under control.
You're welcome.
Yes, I know. Shall we move on?
I wish I hadn't bothered.
The pleasure's all mine, apparently.
Glad to see Father got my signal. Escaping by myself would've been a bother.
You gave your father quite a scare.
He was worried sick.
Not the first time, won't be the last. Can't be helped.
What did you find out from spying on Ulgo?
Tell me what you learned.
Oh, nothing... just Ulgo's top secret plans to destroy House Organa.
Just leave.
Not until I deliver the goods.
Here, take this. Give it to my father immediately. No time to explain. He'll understand.
I'll find my own way out. My cover with Ulgo may be blown, but I can still be useful inside House Thul.
Next time, try not to get captured.
Sounds like a plan.
I'd better go. That chaos you caused won't cover my escape forever.
You have more energy than a dreadnaught reactor.
Nothing slows you down.
You don't know the half of it, Master Jedi.
May the Force be with you, Andra Cressen.
Stay safe out there.
Likewise, Master Jedi.
Want to fight for the whole galaxy? The Republic could use you.
You should join my team.
Sorry, soldier. Got my own war to win.
You're the most interesting person I've met on this whole planet.
Blast, you're fun.
I know. The rest are pretty stiff.
Don't I even get a kiss goodbye?
[Flirt] You can't just leave.
Sure. Not like anyone will see.
Hmph. That was better than I expected. Good for you.
In front of your friends? How romantic. I'll pass.
I won't stop you.
Funny... for a second, I was afraid you'd been ordered to drag me home.
Good riddance.
The next time I get captured, I hope Father sends someone with better manners.
Thanks again for the assist. Get that datapad to my father on the double. Lives are at stake!
This isn't a game, and you're a terrible spy. Stay out of this war.
Go home, you amateur.
Don't hold back, friends. Tell me what you really think.
I thought Jedi were supposed to be kind and decent.
You soldiers think you're the only ones who can fight.
Berated for incompetence by an offworld spacer. How humiliating.
I thought we might get to be friends. Wishful thinking.
Can't say I've enjoyed needing to be rescued. All it's done is prove my father right.
This work is too dangerous.
You might have a point, but I can't quit trying to help.
Accept your fate.
Spare me the lecture, all right?
Stop wallowing in self-pity.
You won't give me any credit at all, will you?
Maybe I don't have to be a spy to make a difference.
Get that datapad to my father. Lives are at stake.
